content: post of any st in round 2 surface slip_stitch along each st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 24 surface sl sts round 6 join around the post of any st in round 1 surface slip_stitch along each st stitch count 12 surface sl sts round 7 join around the post of any st in round 4 surface slip_stitch along each st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 48 surface sl sts 16 roun d 8 note if you hooked up for the surface sl sts make sure you go back to your normal working hook be careful not to catch the surface sl sts when working the single_crochet in this round join in the 2nd half_double_crochet of any 6hdc in round 4 ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in each of the next 4sts 1ex-fpdc around the top of the dc3tog from round 3 skip st 1sc in each of the next 5sts 1ex-fpdc around the top of the dc3tog from round 3 7 times skip st join to the top of the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 8ex-fpdc 40sc 17 roun d 9 note there may be slight cupping after this round it should work itself out after this round ch2 d c2tog over the next 2sts this counts as the 1st dc3tog ch3 dc3tog over the next 3sts ch3 15 times join to the top of the beginning dc3tog with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 16dc3tog 16 ch3-spaces round 1 0 slip_stitch into the ch3-space ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 4hdc in the same space 5hdc in the next ch3-space 15 times join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off using a nj stitch count 80hdc 18 roun d 1 1 note you may need to hook up for this surface slip_stitch round join around the post of any st in round 10 surface slip_stitch along each st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 80 surface sl sts round 1 2 note if you hooked up for the surface sl sts make sure you go back to your normal working hook be careful not to catch the surface sl sts when working the single_crochet in this round join in the 2nd half_double_crochet of any 5hdc from round 10 ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in each of the next 3sts 1ex-fpdc around the top of the dc3tog from round 9 skip st 1sc in each of the next 4sts 1ex-fpdc around the top of the dc3tog from round 9 15 times skip st join to the top of the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch do no t end off stitch count 16ex-fpdc 64sc 19 roun d 1 3 ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in each of the next 79sts join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch
